search_python_client package¶

Submodules¶

search_python_client.search module¶

class search_python_client.search.DrsClient(base_url: str, auth: Optional[Tuple[str, str]] = None, wallet: Optional[str] = None, config_file: Optional[Union[str, bytes, os.PathLike]] = None)¶

Bases: object

DRS client for DNAstack’s DRS API’s. :param base_url: Base url to search on :param auth: (username, pass) for auth access. Defaults to None :param wallet: Token for wallet access . Defaults to None :Example:

from search_python_client.search import DrsClient

base_url = ‘https://drs.covidcloud.ca/ga4gh/drs/v1/’

drs_client = DrsClient(base_url=base_url)

get_object_info(object_id: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

List all info associated with object. :param object_info: Object id of choice :returns: Dataframe formatted responses :raises HTTPError: If response != 200

class search_python_client.search.SearchClient(base_url: str)¶

Bases: object

Search client for DNAstack’s search API’s.

Parameters

base_url – Base url to search on

Example

from search_python_client.search import SearchClient

base_url = ‘https://ga4gh-search-adapter-presto-covid19-public.staging.dnastack.com’

search_client = SearchClient(base_url=base_url)

search_table(query: str) → Iterator¶
